short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A dynamic analog clock that stretches time based on solar cycles, you always have 12 hours of daylight!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Imagine a clock that defies the constraints of time, offering a perpetual 12 hours of daylight. This dynamic analog marvel stretches and compresses time, aligning itself with the sun's celestial dance. Whether you seek extended productivity, a serene ambiance, or simply a unique conversation starter, this solar-synced timepiece redefines the very concept of timekeeping, offering a glimpse into a world where daylight knows no bounds.
